sentences.en: Around one - fifth of the world's land area lies within the permafrost zone.
sentences.cn: 世界陆地面积的 五分之一 在永久冻土区.

sentences.en: As permafrost gets warmer, it could become wetlands.
sentences.cn: 永久冻土变得更加温暖时, 将变成湿地.

sentences.en: As the permafrost melts, the land loses its capacity to absorb water.
sentences.cn: 由于冻土融化, 陆地会失去吸水性.

sentences.en: Frost crack is the main failuve of asphalt pavement in permafrost region.
sentences.cn: 冻裂是多年冻土地区沥青路面的主要病害.

sentences.en: How much methane and dioxide might be released from the rotting permafrost?
sentences.cn: 腐烂的冻土层将会向空气中排放多少甲烷和二氧化碳?

sentences.en: It became entombed in the permafrost, where it remained until recently freed.
sentences.cn: 它被掩埋在永久冻土层里, 直到最近才被挖掘出来.

sentences.en: Many underground pipelines are carried with heating tracer in permafrost region.
sentences.cn: 分析了带伴热管的寒区埋地管道的几何特性,建立了数学模型.

sentences.en: New understanding of permafrost melt could soon alter global - climate models.
sentences.cn: 一项关于永冻土带融化的新的发现可能不久以后会改变全球的气候.

sentences.en: Perhaps this is caused by the sudden melting of subsurface permafrost.
sentences.cn: 可能是地下永久冻土突然融化所造成.

sentences.en: Thawing and refreezing each year, an active layer of soil lies over permafrost.
sentences.cn: 覆盖在永冻层上方的一层活冻层土壤,每年都会融化和重新冻结.

sentences.en: The harder the material under the permafrost is, the larger the chamber charge required.
sentences.cn: 永冻层之下的土壤越硬, 所需要的药室装药量也越大.

sentences.en: They are distributed in polar permafrost horizons and submarine sediments.
sentences.cn: 分布于极地永冻层和海底沉积层中.

sentences.en: This is the vegetational climate of arctic permafrost regions.
sentences.cn: 这是北极永冻地区的植物气候.

sentences.en: This was a challenge, because the permafrost is barely permanent.
sentences.cn: 这是一大挑战, 因为这里的冻土并非永久不变.

sentences.en: Yakutsk is the largest city in the world built on permafrost – soil that remains permanently frozen year round.
sentences.cn: 雅库茨克是世界上建设在永久冻土上最大的城市——土壤在全年都保持冰冻。
